values:
If anyone cares, I just figured I would pass along my successes and disappointments of last nights bowling. Unfortunately, my team had lost 5 points out of 7, games for 2 pts and series 1. Maybe I have been really stressed and finally released it all during the second game, but here goes something: 159 - 254* - 139 (*highest game career, tied from 1998-99).

Just wanting to pass my success (and disappointment) along.  Later everyone who is alive and reading this anymore.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/21967.html

Here is a chance for me to either enlighten people, or cause controversy over the ideas of reality and society.  It has bothered me from within, and I am just curious as to what other people think.  This may be a chance for me to also gain journal readers too.  Who knows?  Let me toss the ideas around...

For one, after watching what was a edge-of-seat episode of Law and Order - SVU, the idea was passed about the perfect murder between twins.  To begin, though, the twins were fraternal, one male and one female, according to psychiatrists and some medical records.  It was a botched up circumcision that had made the twins fraternal for social reasoning.  The two were born from the beginning as identical.  

By choice of the parents, however, the one boy who had the botch job was given a sex change to become a girl.  So for so many years (I believe the show said 14 years old the twins were), the twins were "programmed" into understanding that they were fraternal twins, and attempted to "program" the "girl" twin to portray the sexual traits of the female.  In the end, when the mess of figuring out the murder, the "girl" twin was told she was born a boy.  Despite all the problems "she" had happen at birth, "she" decided to be allowed to resume the original form from birth, a boy. 

Now I don't mean to give away the ending to the show, however, it does bring up something that I feel could be discussion worthy: Is it acceptable for the parents of a newly born baby to change the sex of a baby from birth, just because of a medical mishap such as an improperly conducted circumcision?  If so, if ok to reveal, when is it acceptable to let a child of a sex-change-at-birth operation know that he/she is not exactly the gender that he/she really is?

I will reveal my on-the-fence answer as I get opinions in.  If anything, the more answers I get, the more we can discuss this if I choose to, so feel free to pass this entry along to your friends.  Please, I ask you not to respond with "anonymous" as your name.  I will not judge anyone just because of their answer, nor will I criticize anyone for their beliefs.

There, I feel a lot better.  That idea has been taking up so much space in my head lately.  :-D  Now I must head to bed and dream of sweet nothings...I think.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/21754.html

Not many people know about the ordeals that I have endured these past days, and even though it is not that important, it should make you wonder and keep you thinking about your own health.  I am a bit more wary about myself after this week.

I have been very unbalanced lately, both mentally and physically.  The mental portion is due to the open to close shifts I had to work during the store manager's last minute vacation.  However, physically is a different story.  I am bruising all over the place on my body, and have had moments where I have lost balance (minor moments of falling into an insole display or having to hold onto something as a crutch) without any dizzy spells or warning.  Maybe the effects of a cold can do that to you, pending seriousness.  

Wednesday, though, was a complete mess when I decide to send my employee to get my lunch (seeing that I cannot leave the store).  One minute before he came back with my lunch, I faint.  All I remember was stretching a bit to liven up my body and coming back up from being bent over.  I didn't stop when I stood up straight, but began to grab one of the t-shirt tables.  I began to pass out and fall into two racks of clothing, one baseball jerseys and the other baseball t-shirts.  I was out for maybe no more than a minute, and I wondered what the fuck happened to cause that.  I make my doctor's appointment, attended it this morning, and we await more referrals and tests to monitor my body.  More to come on this as it progresses.

More to come in general too.

If you have not heard already, I have stepped down from being a store manager in Rockaway.  In all honesty, this has been the most painful thing for me to do without jeopardizing my possible future with the company.  I stepped down on Friday, Dec. 3rd in the best interests of not only the store (cause of it going downhill with no help from my staff) but also for my health.  I was stressed to completely no end, and if I had continued, I would not be sitting here to write anything, but in a whole different position.

In recollection of having a whole weekend off, I gave myself the time to relax and think.  I had a massage, a chiropractic appointment, and a lot of time to rest.  In fact, I had the chance to realize that I miss doing a lot of things that I was capable of doing while I was an assistant manager.  So now I am going to take time for me besides dividing myself to my other duties.

I have to take the time to voice myself more.  I am saving money up to do a internet radio show on here.  I know I have mentioned this idea previously, but this time it is true.  I am also finding myself back into the seat of my famous "Dr. Foxx Scorpio", as I am finding more relationships amongst friends being either ruined or on the verge of ruins, or just that I need to hear a story of what's new in the poligamous lives surrounding Genevieve.  If you are reading this dear, love ya and miss ya doll!

As for everything else, I cannot complain.  The craptacular holidays are coming up, and it makes me more and more scroogish.  I mean, what is the true meaning of christmas, or hannukah (however you spell it), or kwanzaa, or even the Seinfeldian "Festivus"?  Seriously, I prefer to have my friends and family nearby, the ones I love and care about.  Gifts are like a plus.  It could have been this time that I could have had to be in Poughkeepsie, NY celebrating the holidays.  I am valuing the time I have with everyone this year, cause after all, I could be somewhere else this time next year.

I am planning a simple vacation after the holidays, a time waster for my last vacation days leftover.  Not sure what I will do, but I am going to plan to be somewhere.  Other than that so far, that is all I have at the moment.  More to come as re-training commences, and I find out the true meaning to living life without losing hair.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/20150.html

Hiatuses are a bitch, especially when you are doing soul searching on your own time.  I have been a busy bitch lately.  I use the term bitch loosely, for being a man, or as Mario Cantone refers Judy Garland's love to be...half-a-homo.  So does that make me three-quarters-a-bitch for being bisexual and also doing drag??

Anyway, moving on.  Trust is the biggest thing.  I gained more trust in some people, while losing trust in others.  You accept this no matter what the situation is.  After all, life goes on.  I gained trust in my wonderful Michelle, cause she got over the ideas that I would cheat on her.  I understand that I have done things in the past that made her wonder, but for me to be upset more over losing her and losing her trust over something I did not do, it hurts.  I told her that I love her so much that I have never cried more than I have over her.  In fact, I cried over her more than I cried coming out of my mothers woumb, all admitted and recorded 12 pounds and 14 ounces.  (Pauses for all the women to cry in pain and swear that they are never having children.  Ok, we move on.)  My mother agreed with me on that, since she is the one I end up going to for comfort.  I know, I am a mama's boy, and proud too!  But no matter, Michelle loves me wholeheartedly, just as I do wholeheartedly and beyond.

On the other hand, my disappointments and disgust go out to my sister's girlfriend, Nicky, and my district manager, Dave.  For starters, Nicky, the racist bitch that comes into my sister's life and sweeps underneath her like a lesbian upskirt voyeur, has cheated on my sister twice, says she loves her (lie bitch!), turns my sister into a two-face (which happens in some circumstances with bad relationships with my sis), and tells me that I do not deserve Michelle for all the fuss she has put me through while telling me that I should be with a guy cause the family name is a dead root.  I know that is a lot to sink in, but that is the life of one night, in one sentence.  She says this lovely line about me on the night Michelle and I have our birthday party.  So I am drunk, and vulnerable, big deal.  I was happy...until then.

There are some things you don't say to another person.  One is what she said.  I blame her for ruining my part of the party.  If I were her, I would never come to me again.  I would never even see my sister again.  I will also say this.  November 19th, my official day of turning old, if Nicky showed up at my birthday dinner with my sister, I would have walked right home.  She is a jealous person.  I don't know much of her family life, but I know that my sister loves the cock.  Well, I should say that allegedly she said she would overall want to be with a man.  So I give a big nasty cunt to the racist Nicky.  May my father get along with her best.

Now Dave is an asshole, as we all know.  You would think that I am going to give a long story on him, but he is not even worth that.  He bitches at me about my store and my staff and my management skills.  Yet, against company policy, he is taking one of my staff members and giving him keys without the required training manuals being completed.  Secondly, Dave is giving a store to an Assistant Manager who is not completed with his training, another breach of policy.  It makes me irate just thinking that I cannot really manage my store without him having me bend over backwards for him.  So I give a blue balls and disease ridden floppy dick salute to my district manager, Dave.

Ok, now for the good stuff.  November 14th, Michelle took me to see Mario Cantone on broadway.  I know I am hearing the overused line "Who's is Mario Cantone?"  I say this, "Steampipe Alley", and you say "what?"  I say Opie and Anthony, when Mario came on and sang "GET YOUR BALLS OUT!", and you say "huh?"  Then I say "Sex and the City", Charlotte's Interior Decorator or whatever, and you may get it then.  (Breathes.)  Ok, now that we got that cleared, I saw him.  HE WAS ADORABLE!!!  If you ever have the chance to go, see "Laugh Whore".  He is a wonderful comedian and a loveable guy.  I got a picture of him, also autographs.  I laughed, I cried, and I love it.  I can honestly say it was close to being as good as sex, if only I had the chance to hump him.  :-D  I am interested in going again when I have the chance.  A picture of me and Mario having sex...I mean standing together will be up soon.

Well, I think I have cleared the air.  It was quite smoggy, but it is all good.  I may ponder renaming the subtitle to "I am Mario Cantone's biggest bitch", but that is after I proclaim "Michelle's man-boobed Mario Cantone fan's page."  Off to bed, more to come now that I am back with a vengeance and going to see Dame Edna Everage soon.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/19936.html

I hate to do this to everyone, but due to circumstances not to be discussed by me, I am calling this journal quits.  I feel I have not been able to express myself to anyone like I should or want to.  As a result, I am taking a hiatus from here.  I thank those who did listen and read my rants, and wish everyone a goodbye.  From another source may reasons for my disappearance be revealed.  If need, I will talk about it, but I feel no one will be trusting of my word.  So I bid you all a goodbye, and wish you all luck from here forward.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/19662.html

Meaningless numbers for anyone who cares...
Peak Flow and Weight
1/360 - 2/360 - 3/355 - 80%/286 - 50%/179 - 290Lbs@12:30AM

Ok, now for the rest.  I AM OUT OF CHERRY HILL!  Finished, Kaput, Done, Finito, Fin, Finalized, Complete.

After a bad asthma attack and three days out of work, I am now being transferred into a bigger volume store.  I am going to Monmouth Mall.  Good thing is I am back at home.  So this may pave the way for me to get my new store.  One can only wait.

I am happier at home too, cause I am comfortable in a much better bed.  I am near the one I love, and I am out of whatever was growing in that room.  YUCK!

Cherry Hill was great while it lasted, but was too long to replace.  Now I can get back to a semi-normal life.

As you see by the numbers at the top, I am now taking my asthma into my own hands.  I am trying to watch my weight and my peak flow counts.  First three numbers are what attempt the count was and the count result.  So 1/360 is attempt one at 360.  Then you see 80% and 50%.  Those are for what is good, average, and bad.  Above 80% is good.  About 50% to 80% is average and I should watch how active I am.  Below 50% means I am in deep shit trouble if I don't watch myself, and contact my doctor.  Then there is my weight and the time my counts were recorded.  This is just in case anyone cares to see how I am doing to conquer the goals of relieving myself from the asthma problem.  It may never go away, but at least I know where I stand.

Overall, I was very stressed out, and now I am much more relaxed and goal focused.  Once I get back to work, I will be a lot more focused on my training.  For now, as I said, we only can wait.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/18038.html

well, the RTV project is seventy-five percent done.  It is just enough to give us a lot of room on the sales floor.  Now the shoes have to be ridden of, and we will be all set.  A new store with new stock and a new manager (ok, we all wish).  No word on Poughkeepsie, or rather, any store yet.  More to be posted soon.  As for now, I am going to get some well needed sleep in my, and I do mean MY bed!  :-D  Nighty night.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/17312.html

Big things are happening, and it is my job to oversee everything being done.  For starters, we have a big gain to work on for the week.  I am glad that visually, everything is coming together.  The district manager for Lady Foot Locker had stopped in and made a mention about the store looking good.  I hope this made Dave (my DM) alot happier that things looked good for the store with me in it.

And we all know Murphy's Law well enough.  Rather I should say I know it too well with this company.  We just changed our wall displays and what do they decide to do...not just a simple transfer, but the biggest project in ten years.  A MASS RTV (Return To Vendor)!  So just about half the store will be RTVed.  The company expects 110 boxes to be shipped in two days.  I say BULLSHIT!

Well, it is great at least for now to be at home, in the arms of loved ones.  I have to work Mother's day, but I am getting the fuck out at 6:30, cause the mall closes at 6:00, and heading my way northbound to Piscataway.

Anywho. more to come...
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/17070.html

Late winter has been the opportune time to make it feel as though I am in deconstruction mode.  Fights, arguments, and the usual doubting myself, all have left me to realize that winter is just a fucked up psychological concept besides being a season.  So now, as I am hitting a wall instead of rock bottom in the process, I am now getting ready for Spring.  The room is almost to where it should be, and my promotion is near.  All that has to change is my attitude and the active lifestyle I have been looking to start.  I will have more in time.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/13649.html

"We have the power.  We have the materials to rebuild him.  It will only be a matter of time."

I am undergoing changes that will affect my life as we all know it.  Promotion, spring cleaning head to toe and one side of room to other.  My Journal will even be updated, and completely redone possibly.  More to come, contact me via e-mail for anything.
http://lost-in-reality.livejournal.com/13312.html
